frontend.description: frontend source files and build configuration

scripts.constants: constant values used through the project
scripts.functions: pure functions used to simplify or consolidate the code

abstracts.description: this subdirectory contains no actual styles, but rather just functions and mechanisms that help to define other styles (essentially your “helpers” directory).

base.description: this is the boilerplate styles used globally across the application. In this directory we would include our default CSS resets and typography styles.

components.description: components directory following the Atomic Design system

content.frontendBuild: this directory contains the frontend compilers configuration files such as Webpack or whatever else is needed
